nodes.excerpt: Our serverless Kubernetes platform is designed for the needs of fast moving development teams who want to focus on delivering applications, not operations.
nodes.title: CTO.ai 2.0 - A smarter workflow for Cloud Native apps

nodes.excerpt: Business Banking APIs empower any aggregator, platform, neobank, or marketplace to easily perform banking functions on top of their existing corporate accounts or enable the same for their customers in India.
nodes.title: Business Banking APIs by Decentro - Perform banking functions on top of corporate accounts

nodes.excerpt: Troposphere provides easy to use global weather, climate and location search APIs. Get started for free with the first 1,000 api calls per month for free.
nodes.title: Troposphere - Global weather and climate data API for your projects
nodes.author: Manuel Bauer

nodes.excerpt: We solve business needs by finding trade partners. We built a Checkout where the storeowner can say their needs, and the customers can checkout fulfilling the stores needs to get his product! Our MVP app got shopify editorial pick out of 5000 apps in 2 days
nodes.title: baartr - Exchange your product/service to fullfil your business need
nodes.author: Rah G

nodes.excerpt: Our 1-click video call platform enables the end customer to call the business with zero friction. Visual engagement creates trust, facilitates the transaction, accelerates sales, improves satisfaction. Make real-time video an integral part of your solutions.
nodes.title: 11Sight - 1-click video calls for customers on your product or website
nodes.author: Dr. Aleks Gollu

nodes.excerpt: We have built a tool for developers and businesses in Africa to engage thier customers via different messaging channels like SMS,Voice,Email,Whatsapp We currently have built APIs for devs to integrate and working on no-code tools for business owners.
nodes.title: Sendchamp - Multi-channel messaging tool for devs & businesses in Africa
nodes.author: GOODNESS  KAYODE

nodes.excerpt: Booste APIs boiling all the pains of the production ML stack into a single line of code. We're super excited to launch an API to OpenAI's powerful new no-training-needed image classifier to Python and Node. Give it a spin!
nodes.title: CLIP API by Booste - Use OpenAI's newest image classifier with one line of code.
nodes.author: Erik Dunteman

nodes.excerpt: Get a video call and scheduler feature into your services in the blink of an eye. Wondercall 2.0 is the more powerful embedded video call system for any website & app. Now you can not only make calls but also schedule them. And the way to check all engagement!
nodes.title: Wondercall 2.0 - Add video call and scheduler into any service in seconds

nodes.excerpt: Links are the glue of the internet, yet by themselves they're just a string of undecipherable characters. With Peekalink, turn them into rich content your users will be delighted to share and engage in.

nodes.title: Rutter - One API for every Ecommerce platform

nodes.excerpt: Persona offers a suite of fully-automated identity verification components with worldwide coverage that can be configured and branded to create custom-tailored flows for any use case. Sign up for the Starter plan and start for free in <10 minutes.
nodes.title: Persona - Identity verification for any use case, starting at $0

nodes.title: Public APIs 3.0 - A collective list of public apis, tools, & knowledge base.

nodes.excerpt: SpoofSense is a powerful AI algorithm that detects Live v/s Spoof Faces in an Image. It uses Deep Learning to detect Print/Digital Spoof Faces and authenticates Real Faces using just a picture.
nodes.title: SpoofSense - AI for Face Liveness Detection
nodes.author: Kartikeya Bhardwaj

nodes.excerpt: Surprise your customers with invoices, newsletters and pretty much any URL or HTML template converted into high-quality PDFs without the hassle and costs of developing your own solution. Scalable
nodes.title: Pdfbix - Scalable REST API to generate PDF

nodes.excerpt: Check is a payroll-as-a-service API that lets you embed payroll directly in your product. We provide all the building blocks for full-featured payroll, including a powerful API, modular white-label onboarding components, and a partner dashboard.
nodes.title: Check - Embed payroll in your product

nodes.excerpt: Base64.ai is a cloud API that can extract data, photos, and signatures from all types of documents. We have prebuilt models for IDs, driver licenses, passports, visas, invoices, and many more document types. The integration is only a single API call.
nodes.title: Base64.ai - Extract text, data, photos and more from all types of docs
nodes.author: Chris Messina
